name: Fat Fireman
description:
My first submission to Ludum Dare :) .

You are a fat firefighter who has to connect hydrant to a firecar, but remember - we are fat and weak...

FIrst, pick a key, run to the hydrant, and then go for hose, connect one side to hydrant and another to firecar.
You can handle key and hose but your stamina will be lower!
iF you stay, your stamina will be raise minimal, but remember about water in firecar!

Controls: arrows, press left shift for speedup.
